## Type of Change

## Checklist
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] No secrets, API keys, or credentials are committed
- [ ] Tests pass locally (`pytest`)
- [ ] Lint passes (`ruff check torq_console/`)
- [ ] Type checks pass (`mypy torq_console/`)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Deployment configs verified (if changed)

## Security Review (if deployment/config changes)
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets in vercel.json, Dockerfile, or config files
- [ ] Environment variables use Vercel Dashboard / CI secrets (not inline values)
- [ ] .gitignore covers any new sensitive file patterns
